mapper.select: SELECT MAX(technologytypeCode) as technologytypeCodeSaiban FROM M011TechnologyType
SELECT technologyTypeCode, technologyTypeName FROM M011TechnologyType WHERE technologytypeName = #{technologytypeName}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO M011TechnologyType( technologytypeCode, technologytypeName, updateTime, createTime updateUser ) VALUE( #{technologytypeCode}, #{technologytypeName}, NOW(), NOW(), #{updateUser} )
